name: Forgetful
description:
Help the little witch get ready for the fall festivities by finding all the items on the lists to clean! There are three rooms all in need of organizing, and they'll get harder as you go. Good luck!

Forgetful is a hidden object puzzle game, find and collect all the objects before time runs out. You get two minutes to complete every level. Use the left mouse button to select items. Good luck and happy Fall!
